title: The current state of Anivia is unacceptable
body: When will she get massive nerfs? Literally one of the most broken champs in the game, takes little skill pre lvl 6 and after level 6 she takes no skill to be played at all. Her itemization is so good, she has so good base damages you can go catalyst + tear and still do stupid amounts of damage. She needs severe nerfs to at least uer E
